casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Robert E. FIELD, Defendant-Appellant. No. 28872

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Sept. 17, 1970. Gerald L. Burrows, Atlanta, Ga., for appellant. John W. Stokes, Jr., U. S. Atty., Allen L. Chancey, Jr., Asst. U. S. Atty., Atlanta, Ga., for appellee.

Before THORNBERRY, MORGAN and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5th Cir.; See Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Co. of New York, et al., 5th Cir., 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 430 F.2d 966 (5th Cir. 1970).
